title: Module-Based Telehealth Practical Training for Advanced Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Evening/weekend lecture operations for working adults, with practical environments utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Explain the procedures for accurately assessing and documenting patient conditions on telehealth platforms
Identify three or more ethical issues that may arise during non-face-to-face medical consultations through simulation scenarios
Apply telehealth communication skills with 80% or higher scores in modular formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
